get.description: Get the list of support rest operations.

200.description: OK -- The list of operations has been returned.

get.description: Returns a list of blob acquistions.

200.description: OK -- The list of acquisitions has been returned.

404.description: NOT FOUND -- The specified farm cannot be found.

get.description: Returns the blob service.

200.description: OK -- The blob service has been returned.

404.description: NOT FOUND -- The specified farm was not found.

get.description: Returns the list of metric definitions for blob service.

200.description: OK -- This list of metric definitions for blob service has been returned.

404.description: NOT FOUND -- The specified farm was not found.

get.description: Returns a list of metrics for blob service.

200.description: OK -- The list of metrics has been returned.

404.description: NOT FOUND -- The specified farm was not found.

200.description: OK -- Operation has been accepted and processed

202.description: ACCEPTED - Operation has been accepted will be processed asynchronously

get.description: Returns the status of a container migration job.

200.description: OK -- Operation has been accepted and processed

get.description: Returns the list of containers which can be migrated in the specified share.

200.description: OK -- The list of containers has been returned.

404.description: NOT FOUND -- The specified farm or share was not found.

get.description: Returns a list of destination shares that the system considers as best candidates for migration.

200.description: OK -- The list of shares has been returned.

404.description: NOT FOUND -- The specified farm or share was not found.

post.description: Starts a container migration job to migrate containers to the specified destination share.

200.description: OK -- Container has been migrated

202.description: ACCEPTED -- Operation accepted and will be performed asynchronously

200.description: OK -- The new storage farm has been created.

get.description: Returns the Storage properties and settings for a specified storage farm.

200.description: OK -- The farm has been returned.

404.description: NOT FOUND -- The specified farm was not found.

200.description: OK -- The properties and settings of storage farm have been updated.

get.description: Returns a list of metric definitions for a storage farm.

200.description: OK -- The list of metric definitions has been returned.

404.description: NOT FOUND -- The specified farm was not found.

get.description: Returns a list of storage farm metrics.

200.description: OK -- The list of metrics has been returned.

404.description: NOT FOUND -- The specified farm was not found.

get.description: Returns a list of all storage farms.

200.description: OK -- The list of storage farms has been returned.

post.description: Start garbage collection on deleted storage objects.

200.description: OK -- Garbage collection has completed.

get.description: Returns the state of the garbage collection job.

200.description: OK -- The state of garbage collection has been returned.

404.description: NOT FOUND -- The specified farm or garbage collection job can not be found.

get.description: Returns the queue service.

200.description: OK -- Queue service has been returned.

404.description: NOT FOUND -- The specified farm was not found.

get.description: Returns a list of metric definitions for queue service.

200.description: OK -- The list of metric definitions has been returned.

404.description: NOT FOUND -- The specified farm was not found.

get.description: Returns a list of metrics for the queue service.

200.description: OK -- The list of metrics has been returned.

404.description: NOT FOUND -- The specified farm was not found.

put.description: Create or update an existing storage quota.

200.description: OK -- The storage quota has been created or updated.

404.description: NOT FOUND -- The location or quota was not found.

200.description: OK -- The storage quota has been deleted.

404.description: NOT FOUND -- The location or storage quota cannot be found.

get.description: Returns the specified storage quota.

200.description: OK -- The storage quota has been returned.

404.description: NOT FOUND -- The location or storage quota cannot be found.

get.description: Returns a list of storage quotas at the given location.

200.description: OK -- The list of storage quotas has been returned.

404.description: OK -- The location does not exist.

get.description: Returns a list of storage shares.

200.description: OK -- The list of storage shares has been returned.

404.description: NOT FOUND -- The farm cannot be found.

get.description: Returns a list of metrics for a storage share.

200.description: OK -- The list of metrics has been returned.

404.description: NOT FOUND -- The farm or share cannot be found.

get.description: Returns a list of metric definitions for a storage share.

200.description: OK -- The list of metric definitions has been returned.

404.description: NOT FOUND -- The farm cannot be found.

get.description: Returns a storage share.

200.description: OK -- The storage share has been returned.

404.description: NOT FOUND -- The farm or storage share cannot be found.

get.description: Returns a list of storage accounts.

200.description: OK -- The list of storage accounts has been returned.

404.description: NOT FOUND -- The specified farm was not found.

get.description: Returns the requested storage account.

200.description: OK -- The storage account has been returned.

404.description: NOT FOUND -- The storage account or farm was not found.

200.description: OK -- Undelete either has been performed or account was not deleted.

get.description: Returns the table servie.

200.description: OK -- Table service has been returned.

404.description: NOT FOUND -- The specified farm was not found.

get.description: Returns a list of metric definitions for table service.

200.description: OK -- The list of metric definitions has been returned.

404.description: NOT FOUND -- The specified farm was not found.

get.description: Returns a list of metrics for table service.

200.description: OK -- The list of metrics has been returned.

404.description: NOT FOUND -- The specified farm was not found.

frontEndCpuBasedKeepAliveThrottlingEnabl.description: Switch of front end CPU based keep-alive throttling.

frontEndCpuBasedKeepAliveThrottlingPerce.description: Threshold (% percentage) of front end CPU based keep-alive throttling.
Threshold (% percentage) of requests to throttle in front end CPU based keep-alive throttling.

frontEndCpuBasedKeepAliveThrottlingCpuMo.description: Interval (in second) of CPU monitor for front end CPU based keep-alive throttling.

frontEndMemoryThrottlingEnabled.description: Switch of front end memory throttling.

frontEndMaxMillisecondsBetweenMemorySamp.description: Maxium interval (in millisecond) between memory samples of front end.

frontEndMemoryThrottleThresholdSettings.description: Front end memory throttle threshold settings.

frontEndMinThreadPoolThreads.description: Front end minimum number of threads in thread pool.

frontEndThreadPoolBasedKeepAliveIOComple.description: Threshold of front end thread pool based keep-alive IO completion.

frontEndThreadPoolBasedKeepAliveWorkerTh.description: Threshold of front end thread pool based keep-alive worker thread.

frontEndThreadPoolBasedKeepAliveMonitorI.description: Monitor interval (in seconds) of front end thread pool based keep-alive monitor.

frontEndThreadPoolBasedKeepAlivePercenta.description: Percentage (%) of front end thread pool based keep-alive.

frontEndUseSlaTimeInAvailability.description: Switch of whether front end uses SLA time in availability.

frontEndHttpsListenPort.description: The HTTPs port of the storage service front end.

frontEndHttpListenPort.description: The HTTP port of the storage service front end.

name.description: The name of the operation being performed on this particular object. It should match the action name that appears in RBAC / the event service.

display.description: Contains the localized display information for this particular operation / action.

Display.description: Contains the localized display information for this particular operation / action.

provider.description: The localized friendly form of the resource provider name  it is expected to also include the publisher/company responsible. It should use Title Casing and begin with "Microsoft" for 1st party services. e.g. "Microsoft Monitoring Insights" or "Microsoft Compute."

resource.description: The localized friendly form of the resource type related to this action/operation  it should match the public documentation for the resource provider.

operation.description: The localized friendly name for the operation, as it should be shown to the user.

description.description: The localized friendly description for the operation, as it should be shown to the user. It should be thorough, yet concise  it will be used in tool tips and detailed views.

nextLink.description: URI to the next page of operations.

AcquisitionStatus.description: The status of page blob acquisition.

AcquisitionProperties.description: The Properties of page blob acquisition.

filePath.description: The file path of the page blob file on storage cluster.

maximumblobsize.description: The maximum size of the page blob.

status.description: The status of the page blob acquisition.

susbcriptionid.description: ID of the subscription associated with the the page blob.

storageaccount.description: The storage account that holds the page blob.

container.description: The container associated with the the page blob.

blob.description: The name of the page blob.

acquisitionid.description: The ID of page blob acquisition.

properties.description: The properties of page blob acquisition.

AcquisitionList.description: The list of page blob acquisitions.

blobSvcContainerGcInterval.description: The interval (in seconds) of container garbage collection.

blobSvcShallowGcInterval.description: The interval (in seconds) of shallow garbage collection.

blobSvcStreamMapMinContainerOccupancyPer.description: The minimal container occupancy percent for stream mapping.

sharename.description: The name of the share where the container locates.

accountname.description: The name of storage account where the container locates.

usedBytesInPrimaryVolume.description: The used space (in Bytes) of the container in the primary volume.

containerState.description: The current state of the container.

MigrationResult.description: The result of the container migration.

sourceShareName.description: The name of source storage share.

containerName.description: The name of container to be migrated.

destinationShareName.description: The name of destination storage share.

subEntitiesCompleted.description: The number of entities which have been migrated.

subEntitiesFailed.description: The number of entities which failed in migration.

storageAccountName.description: The name of storage account where the container locates.

containerName.description: NThe name of the container to be migrated.

destinationShareUncPath.description: The UNC path of the destination share for migration.

shareName.description: The name of the storage share.

uncPath.description: The UNC path to the storage share.

totalCapacity.description: The total capacity of the storage share in bytes.

usedCapacity.description: The used capacity of the storage share in bytes.

freeCapacity.description: The free space of the storage share in bytes.

healthStatus.description: The health status of the storage share.

retentionPeriodForDeletedStorageAccounts.description: The retention period (in days) for deleted storage account.

dataCenterUriHostSuffixes.description: The suffixes of URI of hosts in data center.

usageCollectionIntervalInSeconds.description: Interval (in seconds) of storage usage collection.

defaultThrottleProbabilityDecayIntervalI.description: Interval (in seconds) of default throttle probability decay.

gracePeriodForFullThrottlingInRefreshInt.description: Grace period for full throttling in refresh intervals.

gracePeriodMaxThrottleProbability.description: Maximum probability of throttle in grace period.

healthStatus.description: The health status of storage farm.

StorageCreationProperties.description: Properties of the storage quota being created or updated.

LocationStatus.description: Gets the status indicating whether the primary location of the storage account is available or unavailable.

tenantViewId.description: Resource URI of storage account from tenant view.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of storage account.

primaryEndpoints.description: The URLs that are used to perform a retrieval of a public blob, queue, or table object.

creationTime.description: The creation date and time of storage account in UTC.

alternateName.description: Alternative storage account name being used during undelete operation.

primaryLocation.description: The primary location for the storage account.

statusOfPrimary.description: The status of primary location of storage account.

tenantSubscriptionId.description: Subscription ID of the subscription under which the storage account locates.

currentOperation.description: Current operation being performed on Storage Account

customDomain.description: The custom domain the user assigned to this storage account.

acquisitionOperationCount.description: The count of acquisitions in the storage account.

deletedTime.description: The date-time when the storage account was deleted.

recoveredTime.description: The time when the storage account is undeleted.

recycledTime.description: The time when the storage account is physically deleted.

permissions.description: The permissions on the storage account.

accountId.description: Internal storage account ID, which is not visible to tenant.

wacInternalState.description: The internal state of storage account in WAC.
